CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Account.Prospective_Services__c , "ReturnCenter Referral"), "ReturnCenter Referral; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Account.Prospective_Services__c , "ReturnCenter Connected"), "ReturnCenter Connected; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Account.Prospective_Services__c , "ReturnCenter Integrated"), "ReturnCenter Integrated; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Account.Prospective_Services__c , "ScanPak"), "ScanPak", NULL)
CustomField.label: Prospective Services
